divs: Sighting DetailsThis report is an update to my original report from Aug 21, 2012. These red and green lighted objects have been in various positions in the sky. Mostly in the northeast section with 1 or two in the north and one in the southern sky. This makes the 9th night for these objects. The very large white object has yet to show, but almost certain it will as it has every night so far.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in North Royalton
There was one other sighting in North Royalton on or around August 29th 2012
